attributes.action: Make voting in a general election compulsory and add a catergory 'NONE OF THE ABOVE'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In making the General Election vote compulsory we would get a true indication of the mood of the country and by adding a category 'NONE OF THE ABOVE' would show the polical parties that none of candidates are representing the publics best interests. Only then will we get people in public office who represent the majority instead of minority rule.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
